title: Gratin of roasted Mediterranean vegetables with mature cheddar
description: Served hot or cold, this all-in-one dish tastes as good as it looks. I prefer the vegetables cut into chunky pieces – that way you can taste all the individual ingredients.
ingredients: 2 red onions, cut into quarters and then cut lengthways again
1 large aubergine (the purple Italian variety is best), roughly chopped
2 yellow peppers, deseeded and roughly chopped
2 red peppers, deseeded and roughly chopped
1 garlic clove, peeled and roughly chopped
black pepper and coarsely ground sea salt
400g/14oz tin red kidney beans, rinsed and drained
